body:
https://github.com/temporalio/api/pull/348 introduced `ResetReapplyExcludeType` and deprecated `ResetReapplyType`, and https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/5360 implemented support for this in the server.

However, we need to make the corresponding proto api and server changes for batch reset. Specifically, this will probably mean adding a new field `reset_reapply_exclude_types`, and deprecating `reset_reapply_type` in [ResetOptions](https://github.com/temporalio/api/blob/64ce34ae33a5b56412a6f68edd8f7e1e3a11a80c/temporal/api/common/v1/message.proto#L175).
title: Support reset reapply exclude types for batch reset
